name: Green Castle Aero Club
about: Green Castle Aero Club is a vibrant community of over 150 members, including flying and non-flying aviation enthusiasts, located just 8 NM southeast of Cedar Rapids and 11 NM northwest of Iowa City. The club offers a serene setting surrounded by farm fields, complete with an office, meeting room, flight planning space, aviation-centered library, hangars, and a flight simulator. With a fleet of eight rental aircraft, Green Castle provides comprehensive flight training programs, including Private Pilot and Commercial Pilot certificates. The club hosts various social events, such as weekly dinner meetings and second Saturday cookouts from April to October. It is an ideal place for aspiring and licensed pilots to learn, maintain, or advance their aviation skills in a relaxed and supportive environment. Green Castle Aero Club is dedicated to keeping general aviation alive and strong through its community of passionate aviation enthusiasts.
